catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 777
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: drum core with cup-like shape on either end of decorated cylinder; image of a tiger on each "cup", one is crawling among pine branches, while the other is looking up, toward center handle, also among pine branches; stylized pine trees with large spoked circles with three smaller center circles; stylized clouds and bamboo leaves
medium: Black lacquer with gold maki-e and pictorial pearskin ground (e-nashiji)
title: Large hand-drum core with tigers and pines
